content.question: If <math alttext="the cosine of b equals, one third" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> for a constant <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0 to infinity, of, open parenthesis, the sine squared of b, close parenthesis, to the n power, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover></mrow></mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>b</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
